text: int maxm ( int a , int b ) { return a > b ? a : b ; } int main ( ) { int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , i , j , n , cases , max ; scanf ( "%d" , & cases ) ; while ( cases -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; scanf ( "%d" , & a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; a [ 0 ] [ 1 ] = 0 ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; a [ i ] [ j ] = maxm ( a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] , a [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ) + a [ i ] [ j ] ; } a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] = 0 ; } max = a [ n - 1 ] [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ n - 1 ] [ i ] > max ) max = a [ n - 1 ] [ i ] ; } printf ( "%d\n" , max ) ; } return 0 ; }
